review: Best consultation and advice received for Low BP Visited Dr. Meenakshi for Low BP in body due to portal Hypertension of Liver Because of Liver issues I went into Low BP which created confusion, more anxiety and made me faint before my laptop.Dr. Meenakshi Listened very patiently and I was able to explain my liver history, cardiac history and acute renal issues caused by liver and recovery.She suggested to lower the current dose of High BP tablet and made me feel better during the conversation.My Low BP and pulse rate have come back to normal and My Anxiety and hypertension/hypotension levels have come back to normal after the new BP tablet.Would highly recommend the doctor for the patience shown in listening and going through my reports fully and suggesting better tablets to normalise the BP.
